section.title: Introduction
section.p: The WebDAV module is right now in rapid development to overcome some limitations. More documentation in progress can be found at the Lenya wiki webDAV page

section.title: Linux
section.p: To get started with WebDAV editing under linux you need to install a WebDAV client such as cadaver.
